TypeSignature.Value: public class Timer : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class Timer Inherits Control Implements IPostBackEventHandler, IScriptControl
public ref class Timer : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl

summary.span: 在定义的时间间隔执行异步或同步网页回发。

span.span: Performs asynchronous or synchronous Web page postbacks at a defined interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控制，你可以指定的时间间隔执行回发。The control enables you to perform postbacks at a specified interval. 当你使用控件作为的触发器控件，控件更新通过使用异步、 局部页面更新。When you use the control as a trigger for an control, the control is updated by using an asynchronous, partial-page update. 必须包括中 Web 页后，可以使用对象控件。You must include a object in a Web page to use the control. 你使用控件更新通过内部包含计时器控件控件。You use the control to update an control by including the timer inside the control. 或者，你可以将外部计时器控制并将计时器设置为触发器。Alternatively, you can place the timer outside the control and set the timer as a trigger. 您还可以通过包括启动一个完整的 Web 页面的完整回发控件在 Web 页并不将其设置为的触发器，以控件。You can also initiate full postback of a complete Web page by including the control in the Web page and not setting it as a trigger for an control. 计时器间隔已过去通过创建的事件处理程序时，你可以运行服务器代码事件。You can run server code when the timer interval has elapsed by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中，可以包含动态调整的行为的代码控件。In the event handler, you can include code that dynamically adjusts the behavior of the control. 设置属性，以指定频率回发的发生。Set the property to specify how often postbacks will occur. 设置属性以关闭打开或关闭。Set the property to turn the on or off. > [!NOTE] > 时的准确性返回到 Web 服务器控件文章依赖于的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的准确性`window.setTimeout`浏览器中运行的函数。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that is running in the browser. 以毫秒为单位定义属性。The property is defined in milliseconds. 必须设置属性允许在至少一个异步回发的值完成之前启动下一步的回发。You must set the property to a value that lets at least one asynchronous postback complete before the next postback is initiated. 当控件超出控件，计时器将继续运行时的内容刷新控件。When the control is outside an control, the timer continues to run while the content of the control is refreshed. 如果在处理早期回发时，启动新的回发，则第一个回发将被取消。If a new postback is initiated while an earlier postback is being processed, the first postback will be canceled. 默认值为 60000 毫秒 （60 秒）。The default value is 60,000 milliseconds (60 seconds). > [!NOTE] > 添加中较小的值与控件属性会生成大量流量与其他 Web 服务器。Adding a control with a small value in the property can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 使用控件，用于仅必须经常刷新内容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示显示随机生成的股票价格和股票价格已生成的时间的控件。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件更新中的内容控制每隔 10 秒。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中，计时器间隔设置为 10 秒，以便运行示例时，无需等待很长的时间，以查看结果。In this example, the timer interval is set to 10 seconds so that when you run the example, you do not have to wait a long time to see the results. 每个计时器间隔导致回发导致网络流量，因为在生产应用程序应将设置间隔为仍然适用于你的应用程序的最长时间。Because each timer interval causes a postback that causes network traffic, in a production application you should set the interval to the longest time that is still practical for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件在经过 属性中指定的毫秒数后是否启动到服务器的回发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control initiates a postback to the server after the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed.

value.span: 如果 将启动回发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if will initiate a postback; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以关闭打开和关闭的控件。Use the property to turn the control on and off. 当你将设置到`true`、呈现网页时，控件将启动其计时器倒计时。When you set to `true`, the control starts its timer countdown when the Web page is rendered. 在回发时，你可以更改中的属性值属性，且所做的更改将会反映在浏览器中呈现的网页内容时。On postback, you can change property values in the property, and the changes will be reflected when the Web page content is rendered in the browser. 如果你更改属性，然后将其改回其原始值相同的回发，期间控件在运行时就像具有已进行任何更改。If you change the property and then change it back to its original value during the same postback, the control runs as if no change had been made. ## Examples 下面的示例演示显示随机生成的股票价格和股票价格已生成的时间的控件。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 默认情况下，控件更新中的内容控制每隔 10 秒。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 用户可以决定更新股票价格每隔 10 秒，每隔 60 秒，或根本不容易。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 如果用户决定不能更新股票价格，属性设置为`false`。When the user decides not to update the stock price, the property is set to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在启动回发之前需要等待的毫秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.

value.span: 在启动回发之前需要等待的毫秒数。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait before initiating a postback.
The default value is 60,000 (60 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来设置频率控件启动回发到服务器。Use the property to set how often the control initiates a postback to the server. 您可以更改的值后回发时，如如下所示的事件处理程序的服务器代码中的属性事件。You can change the value of the property in server code after a postback, such as in an event handler for the event. 时的准确性返回到 Web 服务器控件文章依赖于的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的准确性`window.setTimeout`在浏览器中运行的函数。The accuracy of when the control posts back to the Web server depends on the accuracy of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) `window.setTimeout` function that runs in the browser. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性设置为较小的值会生成大量流量与其他 Web 服务器。Setting the property to a small value can generate significant traffic to and from the Web server. 使用控件，用于仅必须经常刷新内容。Use the control to refresh the content only as often as necessary. 当你更改的值属性，ECMAScript 呈现更新时，将重置计时代码的浏览器中运行。When you change the value of the property, the ECMAScript timing code running in the browser will be reset when the updates are rendered. ## Examples 下面的示例演示显示随机生成的股票价格和股票价格已生成的时间的控件。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 默认情况下，控件更新中的内容控制每隔 10 秒。By default, the control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 用户可以决定更新股票价格每隔 10 秒，每隔 60 秒，或根本不容易。The user can decide to update the stock price every 10 seconds, every 60 seconds, or not at all. 属性设置为用户的选择。The property is set to the user's choice. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer.Interval/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified value is less than or equal to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的毫秒数后引发事件属性过后由于呈现网页或上次事件。The event is raised when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed either since the Web page was rendered or since the previous event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示显示随机生成的股票价格和股票价格已生成的时间的控件。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件更新中的内容控制每隔 10 秒。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 股票价格和时间设置的处理程序中事件。The stock price and the time are set in a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在经过 属性中指定的毫秒数并向服务器发送页时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed and the page is posted to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的毫秒数后引发事件属性已过，因为上一次呈现网页或上次事件。The event is raised when the number of milliseconds specified in the property has elapsed either since the Web page was last rendered or since the previous event. 处理事件，你必须在每次回发期间执行操作。Handle the event when you have to perform actions during each postback. ## Examples 下面的示例演示显示随机生成的股票价格和股票价格已生成的时间的控件。The following example shows an control that displays a randomly generated stock price and the time that the stock price was generated. 控件更新中的内容控制每隔 10 秒。The control updates the content in the control every 10 seconds. 股票价格和时间设置的处理程序中事件。The stock price and the time are set in a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.Controls.Timer/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool Visible

summary.span: 重写 类的 属性可以禁止设置此值。

span.span: Overrides the property of the class to prevent this value from being set.

value.span: 如果在页上呈现该控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is rendered on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Visible`属性被重写，类以防止设置此属性。The `Visible` property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. `Visible`属性返回`true`如果客户端组件的类包括在网页上，即使设置为`false`。The `Visible` property returns `true` if the client component of the class is included in the Web page, even if is set to `false`. `Visible`属性返回`false`时将其在容器内，如控制，其`Visible`属性设置为`false`。The `Visible` property returns `false` when it is inside a container, such as an control, whose `Visible` property is set to `false`.

exception.span: 将一个值分配给 Visible 属性。

span.span: A value is assigned to the Visible property.
